issue.title: Vector3::Normalize returns Vector3, Vector[24]::Normalize return void

content.raw:
[Here](https://bitbucket.org/amtj/ign-math/branches/compare/amtj/ign-math:default%0Dignitionrobotics/ign-math:default#diff)'s the complete diff between your branch and this one.

I think it looks like a good start. We should probably also add `Vector3::Normalized`. And there should be tests for all new functions, see [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/d1caec2b23082e84979a6e5f7461bf53505fddb1/src/Vector3_TEST.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Vector3_TEST.cc-161) for example.
content.html:
Here's the complete diff between your branch and this one.

I think it looks like a good start. We should probably also add Vector3::Normalized. And there should be tests for all new functions, see this for example.
